llm_response:
```yaml
name: Run checks
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    tags:
      - '[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+'
      - '[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+rc[0-9]+'
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
jobs:
  tox:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        environment:
          - py36
          - py37
          - flake8
      fail-fast: false
    env:
      PYTHON_VERSION: ${{ matrix.environment == 'flake8' ? 3.7 : matrix.environment }}
    container:
      image: python:${{ matrix.python }}
    steps:
      - name: ''
        uses: actions/checkout@master
      - name: Install tox
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          python -m pip install tox
      - name: Run tox
        run: tox -e ${{ matrix.environment }}
```
answer:
name: Run checks
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    tags:
      - '[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+'
      - '[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+rc[0-9]+'
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
jobs:
  tox:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        environment:
          - py36
          - py37
          - flake8
      fail-fast: false
    env:
      PYTHON_VERSION: ${{ matrix.environment == 'flake8' ? 3.7 : matrix.environment }}
    container:
      image: python:${{ matrix.python }}
    steps:
      - name: ''
        uses: actions/checkout@master
      - name: Install tox
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          python -m pip install tox
      - name: Run tox
        run: tox -e ${{ matrix.environment }}
